actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to make unlawful the tampering with computers of schools and institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.

summary.text: School Website Protection Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit knowingly causing the transmission of a program, information, code, or command that affects or impairs, without authorization, a computer of an elementary or secondary school or an institution of higher education.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to make unlawful the tampering with computers of schools and institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.
